solaris: Fixed an issue where dragging a handle across the view plane when looking through a camera in a scene graph viewer jumped to an incorrect position.
ui: Fixed an issue where hidden parameters in a vertical layout could cause other parameters to be shorter than they could be.

maya: Fixed an issue where the Apple silicion builds of Houdini Engine for Maya were not being included in the installer.

crowd: The Crowd MotionPath Avoid SOP now supports time-dependent obstacle geometry.
general: Husk (and the karma delegate) should handle invalid and unusual configurations of render settings/products more robustly.
image: The OpenEXR image driver has a new boolean configuration option "legacy_mode" which will store all channels in a single part instead of grouping channels in multiple parts.
karma: Fixed a memory leak with displacement shading.
solaris: Fixed a crash when rendering the viewport using a render settings prim that had no products with valid render vars.
